flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: I am going to teach you how to make a Co2 rocket launcher.
guide.introduction_rendered: I am going to teach you how to make a Co2 rocket launcher.
guide.summary: A few days ago i was watching one of Kipkays projects(paintball rocket launcher) in which he used a Co2 canister to shoot a Nerf Vortex football about 100 yards! I thought that was a good idear, but why not merge His project and the old compressed air pro
guide.title: CO2 Powered Rocket launcher.
